name: translator-electron-monorepo
description: Translator by Stage5 - AI-powered video translation tool
author: Jong UK Lee

scripts.clean:deep: npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:all
scripts.build:all: cd packages/main && npm run build && cd ../preload && npm run build && cd ../renderer && npm run build && npx esbuild render-host-script.tsx --bundle --platform=browser --format=esm --target=es2022 --external:electron --outfile=../../render-host-script.js && cd ../..
scripts.build:dev: npx rimraf packages/*/dist && npx concurrently "npm run --prefix packages/main build:dev" "npm run --prefix packages/preload build" "npm run --prefix packages/renderer build" && cd packages/renderer && npx esbuild render-host-script.tsx --bundle --platform=browser --format=esm --target=es2022 --external:electron --outfile=../../render-host-script.js && cd ../..
scripts.dev: npm run dev:init && npx concurrently -k -n electron,main,preload,renderer,hostRenderer "npx electron ." "npm run --prefix packages/main build:watch" "npm run --prefix packages/preload dev" "npm run --prefix packages/renderer dev" "cd packages/renderer && npx esbuild render-host-script.tsx --bundle --platform=browser --format=esm --target=es2022 --external:electron --outfile=../../render-host-script.js --watch"
scripts.package: npm run package:arm && npm run package:intel
scripts.package:intel: rm -rf node_modules && arch -x86_64 npm ci --no-audit --fund=false && arch -x86_64 npm run build:all && arch -x86_64 npx electron-builder --config electron-builder.x64.json --mac --x64
scripts.package:arm: npm ci --no-audit --fund=false && npm run build:all && npx electron-builder --config electron-builder.arm64.json --mac --arm64
